DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy , safety , tolerability Levomilnacipran ER compare placebo patient Major Depressive Disorder ( MDD ) .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Levomilnacipran ER ( Levomilnacipran SR ) Major Depressive Disorder
DOC.criteria: Men woman , 1875 year old Currently meet DSMIVTR criterion Major Depressive Disorder The patient 's current depressive episode must least 6 week duration Women pregnant , woman breastfeed study , woman childbearing potential practicing reliable method birth control . Patients consider suicide risk Patients history meeting DSMIVTR criterion a. manic hypomanic episode b. schizophrenia psychotic disorder c. obsessivecompulsive disorder .
